alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Marion; Monroe; Randolph; St. Clair; Washington (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 23 at 2:41AM CDT until April 24 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. For the second Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In Illinois, Clinton IL, Marion IL, Washington IL, Monroe IL, Randolph IL, and Saint Clair IL Counties. In Missouri, Saint Charles MO, Saint Louis City MO, Saint Louis MO, and Sainte Genevieve MO Counties. * WHEN...For the first Frost Advisory, until 9 AM CDT this morning. For the second Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could harm sensitive outdoor vegetation. Sensitive outdoor plants may be killed if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Clinton; Marion; Monroe; Randolph; St. Clair; Washington
